alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:30PM EDT until July 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LIVINGSTON COUNTY... At 330 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Milford to near Brighton to near Chelsea, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... South Lyon around 340 PM EDT. Hamburg around 345 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 355 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, Lakeland, Unadilla, Pinckney State Recreation Area and Hell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
